bug.short_desc: "changeSelection" strange behavior for a different selectionMode

long_desc.thetext:
Hi,
Here is a short description of the bug and an example.
Situation: We set "selectionMode" of the table selectionModel to 3 or 4, like shown in the example below. Then we listen the "changeSelection" event. The event is fired in this cases: 1) When we click another row (ok). 2) When we click another column inside the same row (probable a bug). 3) When we click the same cell again and again (this is definitely a bug).
Example: I added a spinner below the table, which increases each time the event is fired. http://goo.gl/XmQmMG
